item.title: Learn python gestures
item.description: I wrote in the last article that I used Visual Studio and Fortran, but rufiyaa has been a little bit programming so far. I also like using VBA at work, and I often repeat elaborate automation and make minor changes that make it useless. In other words, I understand the basic parts such as programs and algorithms. Then, all that is needed to freely walk around the world of python is the expression method in python = python gesture.
